title: Roger Federer’s Retirement Makes Room for a New Era of Champions
description: Roger Federer’s retirement will augur opportunities for a new generation of players not named Rafael Nadal or Novak Djokovic.
dc:creator: David Waldstein
media:credit: Asanka Brendon Ratnayake for The New York Times
media:description: Roger Federer at the Australian Open in 2020.
